attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop Political Motivated Disabled Abuse, Bigotry, Discrimination, Hatred And/or Mistreatment, Or Even Disabled Hate Crimes. Towards Disabled People Who Vote Let alone Who Wish To Be Politician’s, Or Who Are Actually Politician’s.  We Are Asking all Political Leader’s and Party Official’s, TO AGREE OPENLY AND JOINTLY TO OUT LAW SUCH BEHAVIOUR FROM THEIR OWN PARTIES. With Anyone Found Guilty Of This, Will Be Automatically Suspended From All Political Parties For Life. STOP DISABLED ABUSE, BIGOTRY, DISCRIMINATION, HATRED And/or MISTREATMENT NOW !.
By Emailing To excllrwendyharbondisabled4derby@uwclub.net; Or By writing To Your Own MP’s, or email the Prime Minister's E-Petition Website

rejection.details:
Sorry for rejecting your petition. Please ensure that the title of your petition is a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.

Unfortunately I am unable to accept any email or website addresses. If you have any questions please email number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk
